# Pulumi core
pulumi>=3.147.0,<4.0.0

# Note: The Sentry provider SDK is generated locally using:
#   pulumi package add terraform-provider jianyuan/sentry
# This generates a local SDK in sdks/sentry/ with full support for
# fingerprinting_rules and grouping_enhancements.
# 
# The generated SDK will be added to this file automatically by the command above.
# See: https://www.pulumi.com/registry/packages/terraform-provider/
sdks/sentry
